body:
### Epic Summary
Incrementally evolve the befly writing platform toward an attention-protecting, distraction-free UIX where protecting attention is the product.

### High-Level Problem Statement
Writers need a thinking environment, not a content platform. The current UI exposes all controls at once (metadata, cover, themes, visibility) and uses blocking modals, increasing cognitive load and interrupting flow.

### Low-Level Problem Statement
both (system: UI architecture, user: writer attention and flow)

### Goals / Outcomes
- Radical simplicity in writing surface (full-width, progressive reveal)
- Visual calm (single accent, breathing space)
- Gentle engagement (word count on pause, milestone moments)
- Frictionless annotation (inline, non-blocking)
- Calm navigation (single-level, ⌘K)
- Reduced decision fatigue (opinionated defaults)
- Focus modes (Write / Edit / Reflect)
- Micro-interactions under 200ms
- Emotional design (return to last doc, "Start a thought")
- Engagement through depth, not noise
- Performance as UX
- Optional advanced layer for power users

### In Scope
- Phase 1: Full-width editor, slide-out metadata panel, minimal default view, non-blocking typography
- Phase 2: Single accent colour, breathing space
- Phase 3: Word count on pause, milestone moments, optional session timer
- Phase 4: Inline annotation design, fragment linking hooks
- Phase 5: Single-level nav, global command palette (⌘K)
- Phase 6: Opinionated defaults, simplified visibility
- Phase 7: Write/Edit/Reflect focus modes
- Phase 8: Replace alert/confirm with toasts
- Phase 9: Last document return, empty state copy
- Phase 10: Audit metric prominence
- Phase 11: Code-splitting, zero lag typing
- Phase 12: Markdown toggle, split preview, version history (future)

### Out of Scope
- Rich text editor (stay with textarea + Markdown)
- Full annotation/fragment backend (Phase 4 is design + hooks only)
- Dark mode
- Mobile-specific layouts beyond current responsive

### Definition of Done
- Cognitive load: ≤5 visible controls in Write default view
- Time to first keystroke: no regression, <100ms perceived
- Typography flow: non-blocking
- Empty states: "Start a thought"
- Navigation: single-level, ⌘K reachable
- Platform feels still, not busy

### Expected Child Atomic Issues
uix-01 slide-out metadata panel, uix-02 empty state copy, uix-03 single accent colour, uix-04 non-blocking typography, uix-05 command palette, uix-06 full-width editor layout, uix-07 word count on pause, uix-08 milestone moments, uix-09 last document return, uix-10 focus modes, uix-11 toast replacements for alert/confirm, uix-12 breathing space
